id.description: the shipment id that can be used for requesting info about a shipment or tracking it

carrier_tracking_no.description: the original tracking number that can be used on the carriers website

tracking_url.description: URL you can send your customers so they can track this shipment

label_url.description: URL where you can download the label in pdf format

price.description: price that we're going to charge you (exl. VAT)
